fields.name: Features:
fields.value:
- Factional kill
- No factional chat
- Members know each others' identities and roles.
- At the beginning of Day 1, the Town will be notified of a large beam from the sky in the distance.
- As long as they're not Empowered, members don't have their roles' abilities and attributes and instead have the abilities and attributes of a random non-Power Town role that they're assigned at the beginning of the game, and they can't use the factional kill.
- At the beginning of Day 2 and at the start of the next day after an Empowered member dies, a random member becomes Empowered. The Empowered member can empower another player during the day, which resolves at the end of the day and causes them to be no lnoger Empowered.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Ensure the extermination of all who would stand in the way of the intergalactic empire.
